pages.text: This mod allows you to combine foods in true 'Don't Starve' style to make some that can have great bonus effects!
Make a Crock Pot and stick a bunch of foods in there! Add fuel and see what comes out. Each food type will influence what is being made and the Crock Pot Cookbook has recipes to help!
Many of these recipes can grant any number or combination of potion effects while also sating your hunger needs!
